getPSControls.logicName: 页面实体编辑视图（与我共享）_工具栏
getPSControls.name: toolbar

getPSControls.logicName: 页面实体编辑视图（展示）_表单

getPSDEFDGroupLogics.name: 表单成员[icon][面板显示]逻辑
表单成员[content][面板显示]逻辑
表单成员[content][表单项启用]逻辑

editorParams.TITLE: name
editorParams.PARSESCRIPT: value?.replace(/@{[^,]*,"name":"(.*?)"}/g,"@$1").replace(/@{[^,]*,name=(.*?)}/g,"@$1").replace(/#{"id":"(.+?)","name":"(.+?)","identifier":"(.+?)","type":"(.+?)","icon":"((.|[ \s])+?)"}/g,(match, id, name, identifier, type, icon) => { const tempIcon = icon.trim(); const params = JSON.stringify({ id, name, identifier, type, }); return `${tempIcon} ${identifier} ${name}`;}).replace(/#{"id":"(.+?)","name":"(.+?)","identifier":"(.+?)","icon":"((.|[ \s])+?)"}/g, "$4 $3 $2").replace(/#{id=(.+?),name=(.+?),identifier=(.+?),icon=((.|[ \s])+?)}/g, "$4 $3 $2").replaceAll(/\{"\emoji":"(.+?)"\}/g,(x, emoji) => {const tempVal = decodeURIComponent(atob(emoji)); return `${tempVal}`})

getPSDEFDGroupLogics.name: 表单成员[formitem1][面板显示]逻辑
表单成员[formitem1][表单项启用]逻辑
表单成员[formitem][面板显示]逻辑
表单成员[formitem][表单项启用]逻辑

getPSDEUIActionGroup.name: 附件表格操作列（仅下载）

getPSControls.name: form

editorParams.SCRIPTCODE: data.content?.replace(/@{[^,]*,"name":"(.*?)"}/g,"@$1").replace(/@{[^,]*,name=(.*?)}/g,"@$1").replace(/#{"id":"(.+?)","name":"(.+?)","identifier":"(.+?)","icon":"((.|[\t\r\f\n\s])+?)"}/g, "$4 $3 $2").replace(/#{id=(.+?),name=(.+?),identifier=(.+?),icon=((.|[\t\r\f\n\s])+?)}/g, "$4 $3 $2").replaceAll(/\{\"\emoji\":\"(.+?)\"\}/g,(x, emoji) => {const tempVal = decodeURIComponent(atob(emoji)); return `${tempVal}`})

getPSPanelItemGroupLogics.name: 面板成员[container3][面板显示]逻辑

getPSControlRenders.layoutPanelModel: data.pcontent?.replace(/@{[^,]*,"name":"(.*?)"}/g,"@$1").replace(/@{[^,]*,name=(.*?)}/g,"@$1").replace(/#{"id":"(.+?)","name":"(.+?)","identifier":"(.+?)","icon":"((.|[\t\r\f\n\s])+?)"}/g, "$4 $3 $2").replace(/#{id=(.+?),name=(.+?),identifier=(.+?),icon=((.|[\t\r\f\n\s])+?)}/g, "$4 $3 $2").replaceAll(/(.+?)<\/span>/g,(x, emoji) => {const tempVal = decodeURIComponent(atob(emoji));return `${tempVal}`;}).replaceAll(/{"emoji":"(.+?)"}/g, (x, emoji) => {const tempVal = decodeURIComponent(atob(emoji));return `${tempVal}`;})
getPSControlRenders.name: logic3
